level.heading: REQUIREMENTS FOR PARTICIPATION IN HEARING (ยง 1-2205)

level.text: To participate in a proceeding before the Board, a person shall file with the D.C. Energy Office, at a time prior to the deadline set forth in the notice of public hearing, the following information:
Whether he or she will appear as a proponent or opponent of the application; and
A statement setting forth the grounds upon which he or she supports or opposes the application.
